org.passay

Class HistoryRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.passay.HistoryRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DigestHistoryRule

    public class HistoryRule
extends Object
implements Rule
    Rule for determining if a password matches one of any previous password a user has chosen. If no historical password reference has been set, then passwords will meet this rule. See PasswordData.setPasswordReferences(List).
    Author:
    Middleware Services
